___validationDate.description: Validation date when household address was verified

___pantryId.description: [Output only] Unique ID of food pantry

___createdAt.description: [Output only] Creation time of the food pantry

___updatedBy.description: [Output only] User to last modify the food pantry

___isCommoditiesEligible.description: Flag to indicate if a household is eligible for commodities

___isActive.description: Flag to indicate if a household is active

___isHomeless.description: Flag to indicate if a household is without a home

___isSingleParentHousehold.description: Flag to indicate if a household has only a single parent

___updatedAt.description: [Output only] Last modification time of the food pantry

___transportationType.description: Type of transportation for the household

___createdBy.description: [Output only] Creator of the food pantry

___isInCityLimits.description: Flag to indicate if a household is within the city limits

___validationType.description: Validation type presented when household address was verified

___isArchived.description: Flag to indicate if a household is archived
